rText: I like this product. Bought it after seeing it on a TV commercial. Good purchase.
I hate this product. Bought it as a gift for my niece. Now I'll have to return it. Bad purchase.
I bought this TV as it was on sale at a great and affordable price. The remote was working fine for the first 3 months but is starting to give problems now.
Very bad deal. The remote was not given with the packaging and the screen was also scratched. Very bad quality.
Great value for money. This sound effect is too good. My headphones make me happy.
Good sound quality. Great value for money. Good noise cancellation and very comfortable in the ear.
The item turned out to b bad.
The earphones are not very comfortable but have good quality noise-cancellation.
